Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_OUTTERLABEL_REPORT' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_OUTTERLABEL_REPORT] GO CREATE VIEW v_OUTTERLABEL_REPORT AS SELECT t.CompanyID, t.ShipmentPlanID, t.InventoryID, attr.Description AS Customer, p.UsrSOCustomerPO AS CustomerOrderNbr, t.LotSerialNbr, ProdLine, t.PlannedShipDate, m.PlannedShipQty, NowNbr AS StartLabelNbr, m.EndLabelNbr, t.ProdOrdID, CASE WHEN (t.PlannedShipQty - (NowNbr * CAST(c.Value AS decimal))) / CAST(c.Value AS decimal) > 0 then CAST(c.Value as int) ELSE CAST(CAST(c.Value AS decimal) + (t.PlannedShipQty - (NowNbr * CAST(c.Value AS decimal))) % CAST(c.Value AS decimal) as int) END AS Container FROM LumShipmentPlan t INNER JOIN InventoryItem i ON t.CompanyID = i.CompanyID AND t.InventoryID = i.InventoryID LEFT JOIN CSAnswers c ON t.CompanyID = c.CompanyID AND i.NoteID = c.RefNoteID AND c.AttributeID = 'QTYCARTON' LEFT JOIN CSAttributeDetail attr ON t.CompanyID = attr.CompanyID AND attr.AttributeID = 'ENDC' AND t.Customer = attr.valueID INNER JOIN AMProdItem p ON t.CompanyID = p.CompanyID AND t.ProdOrdID = p.ProdOrdID INNER JOIN ( select CompanyID, ShipmentPlanID, plannedshipDate, InventoryID, CustomerOrderNbr, max(ISNULL(EndLabelNbr,1)) as EndLabelNbr, sum(ISNULL(PlannedShipQty,0)) AS PlannedShipQty from LumShipmentPlan group by CompanyID, ShipmentPlanID,plannedshipDate,InventoryID,CustomerOrderNbr) m on m.CompanyID = t.CompanyID and m.ShipmentPlanID = t.ShipmentPlanID and m.plannedshipDate = t.PlannedShipDate and m.InventoryID = t.InventoryID and m.CustomerOrderNbr = t.CustomerOrderNbr CROSS JOIN( SELECT DISTINCT NUMBER AS NowNbr FROM master.dbo.spt_values WHERE name IS NULL ) NumberPool WHERE NowNbr BETWEEN t.StartLabelNbr AND t.EndLabelNbr
